This is the official Personal Science Guide to the Microbiome, a detailed summary of how to use the Personal Science site to learn about the microbiome.

A online version of the Guide is hosted at https://psm.personalscience.com. You can download the ebook in [PDF](psm.pdf) or [ePub](psm.epub).

A draft is also available at [Laterpress](https://personalscience.laterpress.com/).
